CustomField.formula: IF ( (DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), 1) > StartDate__c) && (DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), 1) > EndDate__c), 0, (IF ( (DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),(IF(MONTH(TODAY())+1 > 12, 1, MONTH(TODAY())+1)),1)-1)) < EndDate__c) && (DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),(IF(MONTH(TODAY())+1 > 12, 1, MONTH(TODAY())+1)),1)-1)) < StartDate__c), 0, ((( IF ( ((DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),(IF(MONTH(TODAY())+1 > 12, 1, MONTH(TODAY())+1)),1)-1)) > EndDate__c) && ((DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), 1)) < EndDate__c) && (DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),(IF(MONTH(TODAY())+1 > 12, 1, MONTH(TODAY())+1)),1)-1)) > StartDate__c) && (DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), 1)) < StartDate__c), DAY(EndDate__c) - DAY(StartDate__c) + 1, IF ( ((DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),(IF(MONTH(TODAY())+1 > 12, 1, MONTH(TODAY())+1)),1)-1)) > StartDate__c) && ((DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), 1)) < StartDate__c)), DAY(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),IF(MONTH(TODAY()) >= 12, 1, MONTH(TODAY()) + 1), 1)-1) - DAY(StartDate__c) + 1, IF (((DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),(IF(MONTH(TODAY())+1 > 12, 1, MONTH(TODAY())+1)),1)-1)) > EndDate__c) && ((DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), 1)) < EndDate__c)), DAY(EndDate__c), DAY(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),(IF(MONTH(TODAY())+1 > 12, 1, MONTH(TODAY())+1)),1)-1)) ) ) ) / DAY(DATE(IF(MONTH(TODAY()) >= 12, YEAR(TODAY()) + 1, YEAR(TODAY())), (IF(MONTH(TODAY()) > 12, 1, MONTH(TODAY()) + 1)), 1) -1 )) * Allocation__c))))
CustomField.label: Percentage Coefficient Current Month
